short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run ScreenLab simulated eye tracking scans on any web page directly in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ScreenLab Extensions allows you to run scans using the ScreenLab eye tracking simulator directly from your Chrome browser. See which parts of a web page are most likely to draw users attention. Find out what people miss. Use the heat map results to fine tune and optimise page designs for conversion. For more information see https://www.screenlab.io
